author: Kim S. Nash
title: Companies Sharpen Cyber Due Diligence as M&A Activity Revs Up
text:
Automatic Data Processing Inc. deployed a team of cybersecurity, risk management and financial-crime specialists to WorkMarket before acquiring it in January. 
The ADP team combed the software makerâ€™s technology, practices and internal policies. It also interviewed staff about monitoring for intrusions, training employees and performing other security tasks. The payroll processor also hired a cybersecurity firm to do its own evaluation.
